name: benson
bio: The true leader of the jazz mafia. Every note is an order.

name: duke
bio: The boss of the jazz mafia. Master of improvisation and strategy.

name: ella
bio: The voice that commands respect. Handles all the secret codes.

name: miles
bio: The smooth operator. Always knows when to lay low or blow loud.

name: billie
bio: The heart of the crew. Keeps the rhythm and the secrets.

name: chet
bio: The new kid. Learning the ropes, but got the swing.
